name: Attuned_Ascendency_of_the_Dominator_D
display_name: Attuned Ascendency of the Dominator D
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Ascendency of the Dominator D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, enhances the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the hold duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the immobilization duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the sleep duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the fear duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and the confuse duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Dominators and may be slotted into most control powers.
power_display_names: Ascendency of the Dominator: Accuracy/Control Duration/Endurance
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Control Duration, and Reduces Endurance Cost
